Terms of Service

Last Updated: December 17, 2024
Quick Summary: Use our free bulk file downloader responsibly. Don't overload servers, respect copyrights, and don't use it for illegal activities. We provide the tool "as-is" with no guarantees. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using FileDownloader.in ("Service", "Tool", "Website"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

2. Description of Service

FileDownloader.in is a free, browser-based tool that allows users to download multiple files from URLs simultaneously. The service includes:

  • CSV/Excel file upload for bulk URL processing
  • Manual URL input for smaller lists
  • Progress tracking and download management
  • ZIP packaging of downloaded files
  • CORS bypass capabilities for blocked downloads

3. Acceptable Use Policy

✅ Permitted Uses

  • Downloading files you have permission to access
  • Personal, educational, and research purposes
  • Business use for legitimate file collection
  • Backing up your own distributed content
  • Academic research and data collection

❌ Prohibited Uses

  • Copyright Infringement: Downloading copyrighted content without permission
  • Server Abuse: Overwhelming servers with excessive requests
  • Illegal Content: Downloading illegal, harmful, or prohibited materials
  • Terms Violations: Violating website terms of service of target sites
  • Malicious Activity: Using the tool for hacking, scraping, or attacks
  • Commercial Scraping: Large-scale content scraping for commercial gain

4. User Responsibilities

Content Responsibility

  • You are solely responsible for the URLs you provide and files you download
  • Ensure you have proper permissions for all downloads
  • Respect robots.txt files and website terms of service
  • Verify the legality of downloads in your jurisdiction

Technical Responsibility

  • Use reasonable download speeds and concurrent limits
  • Don't attempt to circumvent rate limits or security measures
  • Report any technical issues or abuse you discover
  • Keep your browser and system secure

5. Service Limitations

Technical Limitations

  • Browser Dependent: Service functionality depends on your browser capabilities
  • No Guarantees: We cannot guarantee successful download of all files
  • Server Restrictions: Some servers may block or limit downloads
  • File Size Limits: Very large files may fail due to browser limitations

Service Availability

  • Service is provided "as-is" with no uptime guarantees
  • We may modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time
  • Maintenance and updates may cause temporary unavailability
  • We are not liable for any downtime or service interruptions

6. Intellectual Property

Our Rights

  • FileDownloader.in and its original code are our intellectual property
  • You may not copy, modify, or redistribute our service
  • Our trademarks and branding are protected
  • The underlying technology and algorithms are proprietary

Your Rights

  • We claim no ownership over your URLs or downloaded content
  • Your use of the service doesn't grant us any rights to your data

7. Privacy and Data

Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy which explains:

  • How we handle your data (we don't store your files or URLs)

16. Fair Use Guidelines

Recommended Best Practices

  • Reasonable Speeds: Don't overwhelm servers with too many concurrent downloads
  • Respect Robots.txt: Check and follow robots.txt guidelines
  • Off-Peak Usage: Consider downloading during off-peak hours for large lists
  • Error Handling: Don't repeatedly retry failed downloads
  • Legal Compliance: Ensure all downloads comply with applicable laws
